title: """"Thunderlords isn't op, the other keystones are just bad"""""
body: Ok so if there is a keystone that is used by LITERALLY EVERY CHAMPION AND EVERY ROLE. It is broken. And the most retarded excuse i hear is that the other keystones are all bad. They should at least change it to where thunderlords can only proc once on one person at a time. Not have the entire team use it on you and die instantly.
